titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE DAILY CARE YEAR AND MONTH - Description

div.p: NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE DAILY CARE YEAR AND MONTH is the year and month of the recorded NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE DAILY CARE DATE within a Neonatal CRITICAL CARE PERIOD.

For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE DAILY CARE YEAR AND MONTH is submitted instead of NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE DAILY CARE DATE, where the data set record is anonymised.
